frontmatter.title: Plymouth Heights CRC Survey Analysis Project

children.value: This project analyzes congregational survey responses for Plymouth Heights CRC to guide the completion of their church profile form for the pastoral search process. The analysis combines quantitative statistical methods and qualitative text analysis to extract meaningful insights from 68 survey responses.

search-report/
├── README.md                           # This file
├── context.txt                         # Project background and goals
├── requirements.txt                    # Python dependencies
├── church-profile-form.md              # Template form (DO NOT MODIFY)
├── survey-answers.csv                  # Survey data (DO NOT MODIFY)
├── venv/                               # Python virtual environment
├── analysis/                           # Analysis scripts
│   ├── data_analysis.py                # Quantitative analysis
│   └── text_analysis.py                # Qualitative text analysis
└── outputs/                            # Generated reports and visualizations
    ├── analysis_report.md              # Comprehensive analysis report
    ├── profile_guidance.md             # Church profile form completion guide
    └── figures/                        # 16 data visualizations
        ├── attendance_frequency.png
        ├── scale_questions.png
        ├── ministry_participation.png
        ├── church_strengths.png
        ├── cultural_challenges.png
        └── [11 word clouds]
Plymouth Heights CRC Survey Analysis Report
Section-by-section recommendations for completing the church profile form, including:
Data-driven responses for each form section
Red flags and green flags to watch for
Strong preference for blended (mean: 2.91/5, where 3 = balanced)
- ranges from very positive to critical
human sexuality positions and synodical decisions
who can navigate theological diversity with grace

# Activate virtual environment
source venv/bin/activate

# Install dependencies (if needed)
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Quantitative analysis
python analysis/data_analysis.py

# Text analysis
python analysis/text_analysis.py
(mean, median, std dev) for scale questions
These files should never be altered per project requirements
Survey responses are de-identified (ID numbers only)
No personally identifiable information in analysis
Quotes used are representative samples without attribution
94% weekly attenders may not represent occasional attenders
Those who completed survey may be more engaged
Survey didn’t collect age/tenure data directly
as starting point, not final answer
church records for missing data (demographics, financials)
⬜ Complete profile form using guidance document
⬜ Gather missing data from church records (demographics, financials, facilities)
⬜ Draft narrative responses using templates provided
⬜ Review completed profile with council for accuracy
⬜ Finalize profile for submission to pastoral search coordinator
⬜ Use interview questions provided when meeting candidates
This analysis provides the congregation’s voice clearly. Combine this with:
The goal is a complete, honest, data-informed church profile that helps attract the right pastoral candidate for Plymouth Heights CRC’s next season of ministry.
